ROW.NAME: 检查是否导入电力数据

ROW.DATDSC: select a.name, nvl(max(decode(a.month, '01', a.cnt)),0) as yi , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '02', a.cnt)),0) as er , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '03', a.cnt)),0) as san , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '04', a.cnt)),0) as si , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '05', a.cnt)),0) as wu , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '06', a.cnt)),0) as liu, nvl(max(decode(a.month, '07', a.cnt)),0) as qi, nvl(max(decode(a.month, '08', a.cnt)),0) as ba , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '09', a.cnt)),0) as jiu , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '10', a.cnt)),0) as shi , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '11', a.cnt)),0) as shiyi , nvl(max(decode(a.month, '12', a.cnt)),0) as shier from ( select bb.id,bb.name,aa.month,aa.cnt from (select typ,substr(yymm,6,7) month,count(*) cnt from tax_eledata where substr(yymm,1,4) = [%DAT1] group by typ,substr(yymm,6,7)) aa, (select id,name from v_tax_elecom) bb where aa.typ(+) = bb.id )a group by a.id,a.name order by a.id
